channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- Linux kernel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical -- Linux kernel

item.title: CVE-2020-16119|2024-08-04T13:37:53.448Z -- canonical -- linux%20kernel
item.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel exploitable by a local attacker due to reuse of a DCCP socket with an attached dccps_hc_tx_ccid object as a listener after being released. Fixed in Ubuntu Linux kernel 5.4.0-51.56, 5.3.0-68.63, 4.15.0-121.123, 4.4.0-193.224, 3.13.0.182.191 and 3.2.0-149.196.
